title: Develops Bing Vision more and market the feature more
body: Improve its data base and functionality. Market it more as a visual assistant. Ex if you see a poster of a movie you want to see. Scan it and Bing Vision give u a list of the nearest theatres and show times, or post a reminder in your calendar. You see a ad for a pair a shoe you want. Scan it and Bing Vision give you a list of the nearest store that have them in stock.

comments.body: Yes! And add quick access to Bing Vision to the Cortana page, like next to the music search button for example.
